item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 6/12/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Custom CSAT Form for Widget Installations: You can now attach a CSAT (Customer Satisfaction) form to your SeaChat widget. When users interact via the widget, the form can automatically pop up, and youâ€™ll be able to view feedback linked to each conversation directly from your dashboard. See tutorial here. Multiple Image Support in WebChat: SeaChat now supports sending multiple images in a single message when your customers chat with your AI agent.
